title: The Stone Keeper's Realm
description: Will Lorelei Darby's quest to unravel her family legacy lead to self discovery, or destruction?Horseback riding, forbidden forest hiking, battle training, fairy fighting, enchantment curing, intramountain traveling, haggle feasting, snarl abducting, and a delicious love triangle can all be experienced when you join Lorelei in The Stone Keeper's Realm.
author: Mary Clare Emerine
